summary: Provides an asynchronous WebSocket client that connects to the Poloniex exchange, authenticates the user, subscribes to market and private account channels, parses incoming messages, and offers methods to place, cancel, and track orders as well as retrieve live market data such as tickers, order books, and trades.
business_intent: Allows developers and automated trading systems to interact with Poloniex in real time, enabling live market monitoring, order execution, and portfolio management without relying on REST endpoints.
